alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:01PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Diego County through 245 PM PDT... At 200 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over S7 - East Grade Rd, or 12 miles east of Valley Center, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warner Springs, Palomar Mountain, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, Hwy 79 Between Santa Ysabel And Warner Springs, Lake Henshaw, Palomar Mountain State Park, S7 - East Grade Rd, Hwy 78 Between Ramona And Santa Ysabel, Hwy S2 Between Hwy 79 And Hwy 78, La Jolla Indian Reservation, Santa Ysabel Indian Reservation, Santa Ysabel and Los Coyotes Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
